reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's style, with one mentioning it easily elevates casual outfits, and they find it well-made, soft, and comfortable without being itchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stolen sweater
items.body: My daughter wears this all the time and everyone ask, where she got that sweater: it’s Amazon! The material is soft and not itchy, perfect sleeve length for her long arms. Not a heavy sweater but a medium weight. Love the colors and the textures. It’s a beautiful piece. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shape, length, and quality!
items.body: Just what I was looking for! The modern boxy shape that's slightly cropped. Looks great with my skirts and wide leg pants. Nice quality. Read more
items.author: Jessica Merchant

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy!
items.body: So cute and got several compliments let work today. Looks much higher quality than expected. Soft but nice work thickness. Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: Looks great, fits great and price is not too shabby! Only issue is with the smell. It definitely had a chemical smell out of the bag. After covering the sweater with tissue, I put it back in the bag, then added a dryer sheet and zipped it back up. After a couple of days, the smell was all gone. I learned that dryer sheet trick years ago. I never use the sheets for laundry; I just buy the cheapest box of sheets for times like this - and the vintage quilts I get at auction. It works :~) Read more
items.author: TomTom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and cozy
items.body: Very nice sweater! Warm and cozy. Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this sweater.
items.body: I love this sweater. The color is perfect. The quality is thick, and it is warm. I am 5'4" and 182 lbs. I ordered an XL. It comes just at my waist, and the sleeves are a bit past my wrist. I will have to roll them up. As far as comfort, I think that I will wear a T-shirt under it because it feels a little scratchy. Read more
items.author: Isabellamcg

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks Great but Poor Quality
items.body: I bought this green cable knit sweater for a party and loved how it looked… at first. After wearing it for less than an hour, I noticed a thread was already coming out. It’s cute and casual, but if this happens so quickly, I can’t imagine it holding up for a full day of wear. Disappointing for the price. Read more
items.author: Soledad Martinez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice
items.body: Perfect length Great style Size fits spot on Pretty cable design Soft material Washes and drys well Good price for what you get Read more
items.author: Jocelyne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 2-apricot, 5-dark Green, 2-army Green, 4-apricot, Cream, 1-khaki, Black, 1-steelblue, 1-pumpkin, 1-purple, 1-sea Green, 1-army Green, 1-maroon, 4-dark Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
